attributes.action: Bring student loans given in 1999 into line with all others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a student loan started in 1999 that I have to pay off a fair percentage of my earnings each month until its paid off or im 65. Later loans are cancelled after 25 years. If i hit 65 i will have paid 47 years of student loan payments. Its simply not fair, especially with the rate now at 4.8%. How can the government expect to get people into uni. Im nearly 5 years out and still have a £17000 loan that ill be paying until i retire.
